title: 이달의소녀탐구 #484 (LOONA TV #484)
summary:
Some members are dancing in the corner
0:19 -- HaSeul shows off her new hairstyle to people.
0:22 -- HyunJin shows off her English skills. "I like... bread..."
0:30 -- HeeJin is practicing her dance in the corner and HyunJin arrives and distracts her. "Dance Battle~" and HeeJin wins.
0:50 -- HyeWon talk about their photoshoot and how they prefer warm over cold weather.
